title: Broker Authentication with Zerodha OAuth
description: Verify that a user can authenticate successfully using Zerodha Kite Connect OAuth with valid credentials and tokens are stored securely with session persistence and automatic token refresh.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Select Zerodha as the broker
Enter valid Zerodha username 'test_user_demo' and password 'test_password_123'
Complete the OAuth flow
Verify successful redirection to the dashboard
Check that OAuth tokens are stored securely
Reload the page and verify session persistence
Simulate token expiry and verify automatic token refresh occurs

title: Broker Authentication with Upstox OAuth
description: Verify user authentication using Upstox OAuth with valid credentials, ensuring secure token storage, session persistence, and automatic token refresh.

steps.description: Go to login page
Select Upstox as the broker
Input valid Upstox username 'upstox_test_user' and password 'upstox_test_pass'
Complete OAuth authorization
Confirm redirection to main trading dashboard
Verify secure token storage
Verify session persists on page reload
Check automatic token refresh on token expiry

title: Broker Authentication failure with incorrect credentials
description: Verify that authentication fails gracefully with invalid broker credentials and proper error messages are displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Select any broker (Zerodha or Upstox)
Input invalid username and/or password
Attempt OAuth login
Verify login is rejected
Verify relevant error message is shown to user

title: Authentication token security storage verification
description: Verify that OAuth tokens received during broker authentication are stored securely and inaccessible via client-side scripts or local storage.

steps.description: Authenticate with any broker successfully
Verify tokens are not stored in localStorage or sessionStorage
Verify tokens are stored in secure http-only cookies or equivalent secure storage
Verify tokens are encrypted if stored client-side

title: Trading Dashboard Portfolio Summary Display
description: Verify the Trading Dashboard correctly displays the portfolio summary including holdings, position tracking, and P&L visualization with real-time market data.

steps.description: Authenticate and navigate to the dashboard
Verify portfolio summary section is visible
Check holdings list is loaded correctly
Check positions and P&L visualization are accurate and present
Verify real-time market data is updating portfolio valuations
Verify quick action buttons (e.g., buy/sell) are present and enabled

title: Portfolio Data Viewing and Exporting
description: Verify that the portfolio page correctly fetches and displays holdings, positions, P&L calculations, performance metrics, and allows export functionality.

steps.description: Navigate to portfolio page after login
Observe portfolio data loading
Verify holdings display with correct data
Verify position tracking and P&L calculations are accurate
Verify performance metrics are correctly displayed
Use export functionality to export portfolio data
Verify exported file contains correct and complete data

title: AI Chat Interface basic interaction
description: Verify user can interact with AI-powered chat interface, ask trading questions, receive context-aware responses, and continue conversation with message history visible.

steps.description: Navigate to AI chat interface
Input a trading-related question
Verify AI generates a relevant response
Verify the response reflects user trading context
Send follow-up questions
Verify message history is maintained and shown

title: AI Chat Interface BYOAI provider support
description: Verify the AI Chat Interface supports 'Bring Your Own AI' provider integration and functions correctly using a custom AI provider.

steps.description: Configure AI chat interface to use a custom AI provider
Input trading queries
Verify AI provider processes queries and returns responses
Verify conversation continuity and context awareness with BYOAI

title: Trading Signals display and history
description: Verify trading signals are displayed in real-time, with proper signal details, mobile optimization, real-time updates, and access to signal history.

steps.description: Navigate to trading signals section
Verify signals appear in real-time and update dynamically
Check signal details are accurately displayed
On mobile viewport (375px+), verify UI is optimized and touch-friendly
View signal history
Verify historical signals are displayed correctly and can be browsed

title: Responsive Design Verification on Multiple Devices
description: Verify application layout adapts correctly to mobile (375px+), tablet (768px+), and desktop (1280px+) viewports with touch optimization and adaptive navigation present.

steps.description: Load application on a mobile viewport (375px width)
Verify layout and navigation adapt correctly for mobile
Verify touch elements are optimized for usability
Resize or simulate tablet viewport (768px width)
Verify layout adjusts for tablet devices
Verify navigation and interactive UI elements adapt accordingly
Resize or simulate desktop viewport (1280px width)
Verify full desktop layout is displayed with adaptive navigation

title: Accessibility Compliance Tests
description: Verify that the platform meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards including keyboard navigation, screen reader support, color contrast compliance, focus indicators, and ARIA labels.

steps.description: Navigate through the application using keyboard only
Verify all interactive elements are accessible via keyboard
Verify presence of visible focus indicators on focus
Use screen reader to verify all UI components have meaningful labels
Check color contrast ratios meet WCAG 2.1 AA requirements
Verify ARIA labels and roles are correctly assigned across UI

title: Performance Test: Page Load and API Response Times
description: Verify that the platform loads the page within 3 seconds and API responses are returned within 2 seconds under typical load.

steps.description: Load the application homepage
Verify page fully loads within 3 seconds
Perform API calls for portfolio and market data
Verify API responses complete within 2 seconds

title: Performance Test: Memory Usage and Asset Optimization Check
description: Verify memory usage stays under 100MB during normal usage and code splitting and asset optimization techniques are effectively applied.

steps.description: Load the application and use key features (dashboard, portfolio, AI chat)
Monitor and verify memory usage remains below 100MB
Verify code splitting is implemented by inspecting loaded JS bundles
Verify assets are optimized and compressed (images, scripts, styles)

title: Authentication Flow: OAuth Error Handling and Recovery
description: Verify the system properly handles OAuth errors such as authorization denial, network failures, token refresh failures, and guides users appropriately.

steps.description: Trigger authorization denial in OAuth flow
Verify user receives an informative error message
Simulate network failure during OAuth
Verify the application handles the failure gracefully with retry options
Simulate token refresh failure during session
Verify user is prompted to re-authenticate
